comment: Some examples would be that stream where he white knighted Leslie Jones HARD and repeatedly condemned the Harambe jokes, and that video where he sperged out about an article by me for minutes. The one video on his main channel that I remember getting more downvotes than upvotes was a short video where he pretended that he won his debate with Richard Spencer
